author: Alana Mastrangelo, Alana Mastrangelo
title: Michigan State U. Lists 'Acceptable' Names for Chinese Virus
description: Michigan State University is advising its students use only "acceptable" terminology when speaking about the Chinese virus, insisting that the Wuhan coronavirus must be referred to as the "novel coronavirus" or "COVID-19." The school is also encouraging all s…
